housing.regression.api¶

Description

Utilities for Regression usecases.

The module provides custom Estimators and Evaluators for regression problems.

Functions

mape(y_true, y_pred)

Computes Mean Absolute Percent error.

root_mean_squared_error(*args, **kwargs)

Computes Root Mean Squared Error.

wmape(y_true, y_pred)

Computes Weighted Mean Absolute Deviation.

Classes

CombinedAttributesAdder([add_bedrooms_per_room])

Creating my own estimator for addtion of additional features from existing features.

RegressionComparison(y[, models, yhats, refit])

Model comparison toolkit for regression models.

RegressionReport(y_train[, model])

Model evaluation toolkit for regression models.

SKLStatsmodelOLS([fit_intercept])

sklearn wrapper estimator for the statsmodels.api.OLS Estimator.
